title: Macquarie university
body: Hey, ok so i notice that Macquarie university doesn't have a league club and was wondering if anyone from MQ would be willing to join. I got one person but because i don't know a lot of people at MQ that would be willing to join a league club and participate in tournaments i was hoping that maybe someone would be willing to read these forum in hope of the same thing !!!! please reply under this discussion and ill get back to you (^_^)

replies.body:
Hey Prodiigy
Its great that you're interested in joining a LoL Club at University. We're working with MQ Gaming and Computing Society in Macquarie University who have several members taking a lead on running LoL Events and Tournaments. You can find more information on their Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/groups/MQGACSLoL/
I hope this helps. 
Thanks
Ivan

Hi! I'm a first year &  I know quite a few people who I'm sure would love to join a league of legends club at macq, infact i have met/maintained a lot of my friends though league and i think that would be an awesome idea. I probably won't compete myself bc I am super shit at league but it would still be a cool thing to join

Hey Spoorenism,
We have endorsed MQ Gaming and Computing Society in Macquarie University. They have several members taking a lead on running LoL Events and Tournaments. You can find more information on their Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/groups/MQGACSLoL/
Thanks
Ivan
